attributes.action: Stop Chesterfield Borough Council from attempting to join Sheffield city region
attributes.additional_details:
The majority of people in chesterfield that i have spoken with do not want this merger to happen.
if you care about chesterfield then sign this petition
 more info here http://www.derbyshire.gov.uk/community/chesterfield-looks-to-join-up-with-sheffield/default.asp
http://sheffieldcityregion.org.uk/2016/02/special-meeting-to-decide-on-devolution-options-for-chesterfield/
attributes.background: The district has tabled plans to become a full member of the Sheffield City Region, meaning the town’s voters will have a say in next year’s mayoral election for the area.This would NOT help the chesterfield area and we would become worse off economically

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the local authorities involved.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Chesterfield Borough Council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://www.chesterfield.gov.uk/ePetitions-385.html
